term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - solvent regeneration in extraction processes
term.title: solvent regeneration

item.text: Treatment of the solvent for re-cycling, e.g. by removal of degradation products or non-strippable solutes. The term solvent purification is synonymous, but the terms scrubbing, stripping and washing should not be used in this context.

item.title: scrubbing (in solvent extration, in atmospheric chemistry)
stripping (in solvent extration, in atmospheric chemistry)
